org.redpin.android.net.wifi
Class WifiSniffer

java.lang.Object
  Service
      org.redpin.android.net.wifi.WifiSniffer

public class WifiSniffer
extends Service

WifiSniffer is responsible for scanning the wirless network and gathering measurement so that the server can try to locate the client.

Author:
Arno Fiva (fivaa@student.ethz.ch)

stop

mBinder

private final WifiSniffer.LocalBinder mBinder

mStateReceiver

private final BroadcastReceiver mStateReceiver
BroadcastReceiver for reacting on the current wifi state. If the wifi adapter is enabled, start a scan.

mResultReceiver

private final BroadcastReceiver mResultReceiver
BroadcastReceiver for retrieving scanning results and to creating a new Measurement. The measurement is then stored in mLastMeasurement.

private static final int START_SCAN_MSG

initiateSniff

private void initiateSniff()
Try to enable the wifi adapter if it is not already enabled or not currently being enabled. Otherwise start the scanning directly.
